name: Mubashira aka Mush
greetingText: You know that I really like your name btw!
wishText: May this special year be filled with happiness, success, unforgettable moments and more London trips!;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
outroTextNotLiked: And if you didn't like it, my uni has a scary place which you have seen where people go if they feel sad. I'll be chilling there
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
